Package lubiku.castleQuest.Model.NPC

Class NPC

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Parents.Entity
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.NPC.NPC
Direct Known Subclasses:
NPCManager
public class NPC extends Entity

NPC

The NPC class represents a non-playable character (NPC) in the game. It extends the Entity class and is responsible for handling the behavior and interactions of NPCs.

    • NPC

      public NPC(GamePanel gamePanel)

      NPC

      Creates a new instance of the NPC class.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - The game panel where the NPC will be displayed.

  • Method Details

    • setNpcAction

      public void setNpcAction()

      setNpcAction

      Sets the NPC's action by randomly choosing a direction. The action is locked for a certain duration before the next action can be performed.

    • updateNPC

      public void updateNPC()

      updateNPC

      Updates the NPC's state and behavior. This method handles NPC movement, collision checks, and image changes.

    • interactNPC

      public void interactNPC(boolean contact)

      interactNPC

      Interacts with the NPC when in contact with another entity.
      Parameters:
      contact - Indicates whether there is contact with the NPC.

    • generateDialogues

      private void generateDialogues()

      generateDialogues

      Generates the dialogues for the NPC. This method initializes the dialogues array with preset strings.

    • speak

      public void speak()

      speak

      Generates dialogues for the NPC and updates the NPC's behavior accordingly. If there are remaining dialogues, it sets the current dialogue on the game panel's UI and increments the dialogue index. It also changes the NPC's direction based on the hero's direction.

    • changeNPCDirectionToHero

      private void changeNPCDirectionToHero(String direction)

      changeNPCDirectionToHero

      Changes the direction of the NPC based on the direction of the hero.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction of the hero.
